text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
King Halo's performance left a strong<n>impression on me,
but...

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Halo! You ran really well at the<n>tryouts! I might be one of the
newer<n>trainers, but we'd make a great team!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Rejected. A self-admitted<n>inexperienced trainer like yourself<n>
wouldn't benefit me. Go ask<n>someone else.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
King Halo, I loved the way you ran!<n>How about joining me?
I can help you<n>be as successful as your mother!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Rejected. I don't bask in past glory,<n>least of all hers. Is her
history all<n>you're capable of seeing? You're<n>unfit for me
too.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Sigh... None of you are goodenough. Please stop wasting my time!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Scouting King Halo seems next to<n>impossible.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With my head full of worries, I head<n>off to the cafeteria to
grab some food.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Are you still thinking about that<n>stuck-up princess? Sure,
she<n>might've inherited a bit of talent, but I<n>wouldn't touch
that personality with a<n>ten-foot pole.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Her pride outweighs her skill. Placing<n>2nd in the tryouts
doesn't mean<n>she'll be able to stand her ground in<n>the
Classics.
choice_data_list:
No, I'm positive she's got what it takes for the
big races.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
...Well, if you say so. Don't say I<n>didn't warn you though.
Oh, speak of<n>the devil.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Hey, King, I heard all about it. You<n>turned down every single
trainer?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hmph, sadly no one is befitting of a<n>first-rate racer like me.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, you're picky as always.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
But I've got good news for you!<n>Drum roll, please...
Congratulations!<n>You've been invited to participate in<n>the
upcoming scrimmage! ♪

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
It's gonna be a great chance to draw<n>lots of attention. Tons
of trainers are<n>gonna be there. What do you think?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ...Wait a second. I'm pretty sure you<n>got invited to it, not me.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Now, now, don't think too much about<n>it. Don't you wanna
race again?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah, you're right. Count me in.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to show off my skills to<n>everyone and find the
perfect trainer<n>for me!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
All right! Looks like I'll be able to skip<n>the race then. Thanks,
King!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Skip?! Wait a second, Sky! Gosh, why<n>do you always do
this?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Unable to find a trainer that meets her<n>standards, King Halo
resolves to<n>participate in the scrimmage.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: But why are her standards so high?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Phew. Hah... hah...phew. Let's see my time... Hmm, notbad.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Oh... it's you again.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, if you're here to scout me<n>again, my answer is still
the same.<n>I'm not going to accept anyone less<n>than
first-rate—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Bzzz... Bzzz...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ugh, who is it now?! I swear, people<n>always pick the worst
time to call!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ...It's Mother.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: It doesn't matter. I already know<n>what she's going to say.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
"Have you found a trainer? No? See, I<n>told you. Give up and
come back<n>home already."

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ugh... I wish she would stop thinking<n>she knows better than
me! Just<n>because she won a few G1 races in<n>the past
doesn't give her the right to<n>decide my future!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
When I told her I wanted to race, she<n>completely blew up
and refused to<n>hear me out!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
She kept saying things like, "The<n>racing world isn't for the
weak." and<n>"Don't follow in my footsteps."
choice_data_list: Maybe she's just worried about her daughter?
Maybe she's just worried about her daughter?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Worried? ...Heh, as if.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
She's never paid attention to me. Not<n>while she was still a
racer, nor when<n>she left the track and started working.<n>
And now she wants to play the role<n>of a worried mother?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
She'd insist that I have no talent, that<n>I should give up and
find something<n>else that'll make me happy.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: My happiness? My talent? Who is<n>she to judge?!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
The only person who gets to decide<n>what I do with my life is
me! That's<n>why I'm never going to give up, no<n>matter
what!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to win and prove to her that<n>I have the talent. I
won't stop until she<n>acknowledges that I'm also first-rate!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
That's right. No matter how many<n>times I fall, or how many
people laugh<n>at me, I'll make sure everyone<n>knows my
name.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: It doesn't matter muddied I become.My head will always be held high. Iwill never back down.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I don't care what other people say or<n>think of me. I am King
Halo, the<n>first-rate racer, and victory will be<n>mine.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The determination in her voice is<n>almost palpable.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though people may find her<n>ambitions lofty and her<n>
self-proclaimed "first-rate" title<n>laughable, it's a testament to
her<n>commitment.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
That's why I won't compromise<n>when it comes to finding a
trainer.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
If the trainer doesn't have the same<n>level of commitment as
I do, they'll<n>never be able to truly support me.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
...I think I've spoken enough. It's<n>time for me to continue
training.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: If you don't mind, I'll be taking my<n>leave.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
King Halo turns on her heel and walks<n>away. As I watch her
shrink into the<n>distance, the word "commitment"<n>rings in
my ears.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Later, rain begins to pour down<n>incessantly, lasting through
the night.
